column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I came here for lunch with some coworkers. We were invited by Jose (one of the waiters)
column2: and we were all BLOWN AWAY. First off
column3: the service was absolutely spectacular. Secondly
column4: the food was delicious and unique. I had the Bosscat Burger with fries and it was definitely a taste that I had not experienced before. The velvet churros were also very good.
